name: Biorhythm
description:
Biorhythm is an attempt to predict various aspects(physical, emotional, intellectual, intuitive) of a person's life through simple mathematical cycles. 
For more information, please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Biorhythm.

Mostly for fun, no guarantee to prediction result.
install_details:
Edit your birthday in script's s:birthday variable

copy the script into $VIM/vimfiles/plugin

Usage:
type command
:Bio

versions.release_notes: Fix a bug,  now able to handle people born earlier than 1970-1-1
